```{r common, include=FALSE}
# Install/ load packages
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, rmarkdown, knitr, fontawesome)
pacman::p_install_gh("qtalr/qtalrkit")

theme_set(theme_minimal())

knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  message = FALSE,
  warning = FALSE,
  out.width = "85%",
  fig.align = "center",
  tidy = TRUE
)

options(digits = 3)

# automatically create a bib database for R packages
knitr::write_bib(c(
  "tidyverse", "readr", "rmarkdown", "dplyr", "usethis", "gitcreds", "quanteda", "textdata", "tidycensus", "sf", "rtweet", "skimr", "janitor", "ggplot2", "gridExtra", "reprex"
), "packages.bib")
```
